body_html:
If you're using a MonitoredSession and its variants you should still be able to do this:

with tf.train.SingularMonitoredSession() as sess:
    while not sess.should_stop():
        sess.run(train_op)
body_text:
If you're using a MonitoredSession and its variants you should still be able to do this:
with tf.train.SingularMonitoredSession() as sess:
    while not sess.should_stop():
        sess.run(train_op)
body:
If you're using a MonitoredSession and its variants you should still be able to do this:

```
with tf.train.SingularMonitoredSession() as sess:
    while not sess.should_stop():
        sess.run(train_op)
```
